text: Manoel "Manny" R. Cruz (born May 20, 1970 in Minas Gerais, Brazil) is a jockey in American Thoroughbred horse racing. He has won multiple graded stakes races, including four grade II level races. For every year since 2003, he has finished in the top 15 jockeys at Gulfstream Park. Manny Cruz has over 2,800 career wins. Manny Cruz resides in Miami, Florida. ==External Links== Manoel "Manny" Cruz Facebook page ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American jockeys Category:Brazilian jockeys Category:Brazilian expatriates in the United States
title: Manoel Cruz
